name: @cellajs/cella
description: Cella is a TypeScript template to create powerful web apps with sync and offline capabilities.
author: CellaJS <info@cellajs.com>

scripts.generate:openapi: pnpm --filter backend generate-openapi && pnpm --filter frontend generate-client
scripts.dev: pnpm clean && cross-env DEV_MODE=full pnpm -r --parallel --stream dev
scripts.dev:core: pnpm clean && cross-env DEV_MODE=core pnpm -r --parallel --stream dev
scripts.dev:proxy: pnpm clean && cross-env DEV_MODE=full pnpm -r --parallel --stream --filter backend --filter @cella/cdc --filter frontend --filter @cella/proxy dev
scripts.check: pnpm generate:openapi && pnpm ts && pnpm lint:fix
scripts.check:old: pnpm generate:openapi && pnpm ts:old && pnpm lint:fix
scripts.ts:old: pnpm --filter backend ts:old && pnpm --filter frontend ts:old
scripts.tsperf: pnpm --filter backend tsperf && pnpm --filter frontend tsperf
scripts.tsperf:old: pnpm --filter backend tsperf:old && pnpm --filter frontend tsperf:old
scripts.test:core: pnpm docker:test && cross-env TEST_MODE=core vitest run
scripts.test:full: pnpm docker:test && cross-env TEST_MODE=full vitest run
